summary: This mod makes adjustments to Serana's to make her look more like Laura Bailey, her voice actor. There is both a vampiric and cured version. (Dawnguard DLC Required, duh).
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][color=#980000][size=6]Character to Voice Actor - Serana[/size][/color][/u][/b]
<br />[/center][i]Please at least kinda read the description, wasting people's time in the posts section just pisses everyone off.[/i]
<br />[color=#980000][img]http://vector-magz.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/plus-sign-clip-art2.png[/img][img]http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140223025452/infamous/images/9/99/Laura_Bailey.jpg[/img][img]http://www.i2symbol.com/images/symbols/subscript/subscript_equals_sign_u208C_icon_256x256.png[/img]
<br />[size=5]What the hell is this?[/size][/color]
<br />[size=3] This mod makes adjustments to Serana's to make her look more like Laura Bailey, her voice actor, and personally I think it also makes her look more attractive. There is both a vampiric and a cured version, unfortunately I have no scripted skills in the Creation Kit (CK) so her looks do not change automatically when you cure her of vampirism, so just uninstall the vampire version and install the cured version when/ if you do so if you haven't already.
<br />
<br />[/size][u]Incompatibility[/u]
<br /> [size=3]As far as I know this section is N/A to my mod, I simply use vanilla assets to make Serana look more like Laura Bailey.[/size]
author: American Chap
